alert.note: Alert for Eastern Norton Sound and Nulato Hills (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Coastal Flood Advisory issued July 26 at 4:26PM AKDT until July 27 at 12:00PM AKDT by NWS Fairbanks
info.description: ...COASTAL FLOOD ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL NOON AKDT WEDNESDAY... * LOCATION...Point Romanof to Shaktoolik. * COASTAL FLOODING...Sea levels will rise 4 to 6 feet above the normal high tides. Strong southwest winds gusting to 35 mph will push surge and waves up the beach and up rivers much further than normal. * TIMING...Through Noon Wednesday. The highest water levels have already occurred. * IMPACTS...Storm surge and wave run-up will push water up the beach and up rivers much further than normal. Low lying areas near the coast can expect minor flooding, including sloughs, rivers and estuaries. Objects left on the beach could be washed away. Minor beach erosion will occur.
info.instruction: A Coastal Flood Advisory indicates that onshore winds and tides will combine to generate flooding of low areas along the shore.

area.areaDesc: Eastern Norton Sound and Nulato Hills
